Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir/Madam 
 
NetResult Reference: ICC_NRID11658 
 
Please quote the above ICC_NRID11658 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue. 
 
We are sending you this communication on behalf of the International Cricket Council
("ICC"), Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited ("GCC") and ICC Cricket World Cup
West Indies 2007 Inc. ("CWC 2007 Inc.") for whom we act on mandate in the protection
of their Intellectual Property on the internet. 
 
The above parties are naturally pleased that you may already be including content
within your website, http://www.cricbuzz.com/, or intend to do so at some later
date.  The object of this communication is to give you full understanding on how to
use the ICC Trademarks in your coverage of the ICC Cricket World Cup West Indies
2007 ("CWC 2007") and to ensure that any questions or concerns that you might have
can be easily resolved.  We are therefore attaching for your attention an
information sheet on how the ICC Trademarks may be used. 
 
The document, "INFORMATION SHEET - USING THE ICC CRICKET WORLD CUP WEST INDIES 2007
TRADE MARKS" sets out answers to some of the more typical questions that are asked
from time to time by the online media and also very specific guidance on what is/is
not permitted. 
 
As the document explains, only companies that have been duly authorised by ICC, GCC
and/or CWC 2007 Inc. can have the right to associate themselves with CWC 2007. The
ICC, GCC and CWC 2007 Inc. encourage the use of the ICC Trademarks provided that: 
 
* They are used solely for editorial purposes;
* They are always used in the exact format as illustrated in the document; and
* They do not appear in such a way as to imply an association with any other party's
name, trade marks or logos. 
 
We trust that you will understand the above parties' requirements, the purpose of
which is to protect their exclusive rights with regard to CWC
2007 in order to ensure the ongoing success and viability of the ICC Cricket World
Cup event and the continued development of the sport of cricket. 
 
Should you have any queries then please do not hesitate to contact us. 
Please quote the above mentioned NRID reference number in any communications with us. 
 
Thank you for your attention. 
 
Yours faithfully, 
 
Jonny Hartley 
 
NetResult,
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London SW6 5UA
UK 
 
Tel: 0207 471 1730 
 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please accept our
apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail immediately to the
correct person or department for action. 
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
-------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 
 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
